product_name: Outside Inside Graniteware Pot Nightlight - 2013 Closeout
long_description: A classic symbol of roughing it in the woods, this Granitewear coffee-pot is a warm reminder of the simple things in life. As a nightlight it makes a playful accent piece for your home or cabin.
short_description: A classic symbol of roughing it in the woods, this Granitewear coffee-pot is a warm reminder of the simple things in life. As a nightlight it makes a playful accent piece for your home or cabin.
